action.name: Serve this directory over HTTP
action.command: bash -c 'DIR="%f"; PORT=$(shuf -i 8000-8999 -n 1); echo "Serving $DIR at http://localhost:$PORT"; cd "$DIR"; python3 -m http.server $PORT & sleep 1; firefox-esr "http://localhost:$PORT"'
action.description: Start a Python HTTP server in this directory
